comment: Smart data models - Boiler schema adapted to DTDL from smartdatamodels.org. Source: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.S4BLDG/master/Boiler/schema.json
description: A boiler is a closed, pressure-rated vessel in which water or other fluid is heated using an energy source such as natural gas, heating oil, or electricity. The fluid in the vessel is then circulated out of the boiler for use in various processes or heating applications.

contents.name: alternateName
contents.comment: An alternative name for this item

contents.name: areaServed
contents.comment: The geographic area where a service or offered item is provided

contents.name: dataProvider
contents.comment: A sequence of characters identifying the provider of the harmonised data entity.

contents.name: dateCreated
contents.comment: Entity creation timestamp. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: dateModified
contents.comment: Timestamp of the last modification of the entity. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: description
contents.comment: A description of this item

contents.name: energySource
contents.comment: Property. The source of energy. Enumeration defining the energy source or fuel combusted to generate heat.

contents.name: hasManufacturer
contents.comment: Property. A relationship identifying the manufacturer of an entity (e.g., device). The value is expected to be a string or a string with language tag.

contents.name: hasModel
contents.comment: Property. A relationship identifying the model of an entity (e.g., device). The value is expected to be a string or a string with language tag.

contents.name: heatTransferSurfaceArea
contents.comment: Property. Total heat transfer area of the vessel. Usually measured in square metre (m2). Units:'m2'

contents.name: isWaterStorageHeater
contents.comment: Property. This is used to identify if the boiler has storage capacity (TRUE). If FALSE, then there is no storage capacity built into the boiler, such as an instantaneous hot water heater.

contents.name: name
contents.comment: The name of this item.

contents.name: nominalEnergyConsumption
contents.comment: Property. Nominal fuel consumption rate required to produce the total boiler heat output. Usually measured in Watts (W, J/s). Units:'W'

contents.name: nominalPartLoadRatio
contents.comment: Property. Allowable part load ratio range.

contents.name: operatingMode
contents.comment: Property. Identifies the operating mode of the boiler.

contents.name: outletTemperatureMax
contents.comment: Property. Allowable outlet temperature of either the water or the steam. Usually measured in degrees Kelvin (K). Units:'ºK'

contents.name: outletTemperatureMin
contents.comment: Property. Allowable outlet temperature of either the water or the steam. Usually measured in degrees Kelvin (K). Units:'ºK'

contents.name: pressureRating
contents.comment: Property. Nominal pressure rating of the boiler as rated by the agency having jurisdiction. Usually measured in Pascals (Pa, N/m2). Units:'Pa'

contents.name: source
contents.comment: A sequence of characters giving the original source of the entity data as a URL. Recommended to be the fully qualified domain name of the source provider, or the URL to the source object.

contents.name: waterInletTemperatureMax
contents.comment: Property. Allowable water inlet temperature range. Usually measured in degrees Kelvin (K). Units:'ºK'

contents.name: waterInletTemperatureMin
contents.comment: Property. Allowable water inlet temperature range. Usually measured in degrees Kelvin (K). Units:'ºK'

contents.name: waterStorageCapacity
contents.comment: Property. Water storage capacity. Usually measured in cubic metre (m3). Units:'ºm3'

contents.name: isSubSystemOf
contents.comment: Relationship. A reference to a system(s) that this Physical Object is part of.

contents.name: owner
contents.comment: A List containing a JSON encoded sequence of characters referencing the unique Ids of the owner(s)

contents.name: address
contents.comment: The mailing address
